author: jeremias
msg: Added class ColorWithFallback used for recreating function strings.
Adjusted to changes of design in color branch.

author: zoe
msg: ARIES-350 Make the sub-menu font size bigger and the colour darker. Move the items closer together.

author: jeremias
msg: Added interface for ColorSpace to report their origin (name and URI) where useful. (required by FOP to re-generate function strings)
Ported and slightly extended Batik's ICCColorSpaceExt which extends ICC_ColorSpace.
Added abstract class for all device-specific color spaces (does nothing specific but is useful for checking whether a color space is device-specific.
Removed unused ICCColor (ColorWithAlternatives replaces that, too)
